Text.Page:
Castra Mysterium needs immediate resupply. {@LinkCreature:227#1020#Eerix} won't listen to me any more maybe he'll listen to you.

Tell him we need those supplies!

What? Get more supplies? Darn it! Itâ€™s over! Thulsa's troops took all of our supplies.

There might be some left in the farmhouse, but {@LinkCreature:27#16$$Calapana} will have the rest.

You've got a good eye for this sort of thing. If you're ever heading to Castanica, we could make a tidy profit.

Let {@LinkCreature:227#1015#Ovellia} know the shipment's ready.
You're poaching on my time. If you want something, hurry it up.
Supply isn't the glorious side of the military, but it's arguably the most vital. Thank you for helping us get this shipment together.
